citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on 25
September 2024. Contact was made with the wife of the licensee at the residence of the facility. She was unable to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process. Contact was made with the licensee by phone who was unable
to leave work and would not be available until after 4:30pm.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on 25 
September 2024. Contact was made with the wife of the licensee at the residence of the facility. She was unable to 
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process. Contact was made with the licensee by phone who was unable 
to leave work and would not be available until after 4:30pm. 
 
 
End Section
